content: ponni is a patchwork style drop shoulder sweater worked from the top down with a blend of different simple textures it s a fun and engaging project the pattern features shoulder armhole and sleeve cap shaping easy to modify neck depth and a split hem the motifs are both charted and written **sizes ** 1 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 6 / 7 / 8 / 9 all measurements are those of the finished sweater see last pictures for schematic and complete measurements finished bust circ 96 108 / 120 / 132 / 144 156 / 168 / 180 / 192 cm 37 ¾ 42 ½ / 47 ¼ / 52 / 56 ¾ 61 ½ / 66 ¼ / 70 ¾ / 75 ½ choose a size with about 25 cm 9 ¾ positive ease at bust shown in size 3 on a 95 cm 37 ½ bust and a 35 cm 13 ¾ upper arm **yarn ** you will need 950 1070 / 1200 / 1300 / 1420 1500 / 1660 / 1750 / 1900 m 1040 1170 / 1315 / 1425 / 1555 1640 / 1815 / 1915 / 2080 yds of dk weight yarn the sample is knit with wooliette cybele dk 220 m 240 yds / 100 g in verde **needles ** main fabric 4mm us 6 circular needles with appropriate length to knit in the round and magic loop or dpns ribbing 3 5 mm us 4 circular needles with appropriate length to knit in the round and magic loop or dpns slipped stitch pattern 3 75 mm us 5 circular needles with appropriate length to knit in the round or sizes required to get gauge **gauge ** 20 sts x 36 row / rnds per 10 cm 4 with main needles in texture pattern after blocking **notions ** stitch markers locking stitch markers tapestry needle and scissors scrap yarn to place sts on hold row counter recommended **techniques used ** top down drop shoulder sweater upper body worked flat body and sleeves knitted in the round picking up stitches maintaining simple knit / purl pattern during shaping split hem with cable detail at the top and slipped stitch edges shoulders shaped with wrap & turn short row armhole shaping with simple increases sleeve cap shaped with wrap & turn short row sleeves tapered with simple decreases garter stitch garter ribbing slipped stitches and garter pattern with caught floats 2/2 ribbing german twisted cast-on backwards loop cast-on basic bind-off pattern includes charted and written instructions for the texture motifs ------------------------------------------------------------------ ponni est un pull effet patchwork tricoté de haut en bas avec un mélange de différentes textures simples c est un projet engageant et amusant le patron comprend des coupes précises pour les épaules les emmanchures et la tête de manches une profondeur d encolure facile à modifier et un bas fendu les motifs sont en diagramme et écrits **tailles ** 1 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 6 / 7
